Decoy Hook: Alisa's basic grappling hook. No matter how things change, there's always someone standing by your side.
Targeted Hook: Change the modification direction freely! A grappling hook that even a cat can use!
Magnetic Hook: Press and hold to extend the grappling hook! It attracts all resources on its path.
Gigantic Hook: A grappling hook that only catches one target but has a wide range! There's no need to aim at all!
Start the game with Normal Hook
Start the game with Decoy Hook
Close Encounter: Summons a UFO to grab the nearest item. If the grabbed items are the same color, they count as universal cards.
Full Combo: After successfully grabbing three items, scan and grab two items. If the grabbed items are the same color, they count as universal cards.
Identify Module: The grappling hook ignores bombs and projections
Neon Dynamite: Use the hammer to modify the grappling hook. Even projections can be blown up!
Speed Turbine: Increases grapple speed by one level for each successful grab within the current map, up to 12 times.
Pulverizing Railgun: Gain 1 Pulverizing Railgun when the round starts if you have an empty item slot. The UFO can move when you use this item.
Gain 1 Pulverizing Railgun when the round starts, which can pulverize meteors.
Ignore turns and capture the Explorer.
Ore Vein Detector: Summons a detection radar, discovering a high-value item every certain amount of time.
Powerful Grapple: Can grab all items!
Can grab virtual items in the Sun and Moon mechanism.
Ejection Grapple: A grapple that can be fired once, greatly increasing grapple speed.
Universal Converter: All grabbed items count as universal cards in the same-color reward mechanism.
Hyper Gear: When grabbing items, the ship moves towards the item instead, and can grab some items by touching them.
